subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “cooked; delicious”
: Possibly related to the similar-shaped ''*nVm'' word family for “soft” ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}); see {{och-l|荏|soft; weak}}. Also compare {{och-l|稔|ripe}}.

; “{{q|Cantonese|Hakka}} soft; cooked; ripe”
: Possibly borrowed from one or several substrate languages; cf. {{cog|za|naemz||soft; pulpy; thoroughly cooked}}, {{cog|th|นุ่ม||soft}} ({{zh-ref|Lian, 2001}}). Perhaps related to the above.
